How can I download my Capital Gains Statement?

You can download your Capital Gains Statement using any of the following methods:

1. **HDFC MF Online Portal**: Login to your account on [www.hdfcfund.com](https://www.hdfcfund.com). Go to the 'Statements' section and select 'Capital Gains Statement'. You can choose the financial year and download the report.

2. **MFCentral**: Visit [www.mfcentral.com](https://www.mfcentral.com) or use the MFCentral app. After logging in, navigate to 'Service Requests' or 'Reports' to download your capital gains statement across all mutual funds.

3. **CAMS Online**: Visit [www.camsonline.com](https://www.camsonline.com). Go to 'Investor Services' > 'Mailback Services' > 'Capital Gain Statement'. Enter your email and PAN to receive the statement via email.

4. **Email Request**: You can send an email to `cliser@hdfcfund.com` from your registered email address requesting the statement.
